title: Issue prioritization v2: UI for scoring profile selection + tuning controls

sections.text: Add frontend support to select an org/user scoring profile and adjust per-dimension weights (Support SLA risk, Product impact, Sales deal blockers) via tuning controls. Display per-dimension scores and the resulting aggregated score in the issue list and issue detail views, reflecting the active profile. Wire the UI to the saved profiles APIs (list/apply/update) built in GOLD-166 and ensure the default profile matches current single-score behavior when no profile is selected.
